questions.question: In which year did King Prithvi Narayan Shah unify Nepal?
questions.explanation: King Prithvi Narayan Shah unified Nepal in 1769 AD, marking the beginning of the Shah dynasty rule.

questions.question: Which river is known as the 'Sorrow of Bihar'?
questions.explanation: The Koshi River is known as the 'Sorrow of Bihar' due to its frequent flooding and changing course.
